timeline.bodyText: Can we call this TraceMetadata or something more descriptive? I fear that there are lots of classes called Metadata, and it would make autocomplete harder to find, and cause import collisions.
timeline.author: mtdowling

timeline.message: Put trace file classes in trace package
Put trace file classes in trace package

timeline.bodyText: I think this should just be getMetadata to match the file format. The class name doesn't have to have a major impact on the getter name.
timeline.author: mtdowling

timeline.message: Put trace file classes in trace package
Put trace file classes in trace package
